description: Number of ways of folding a strip of n rectangular stamps.
references: J. Devisme, Contribution a l'etude du probleme des timbres-poste, Sphinx, 7 (Dec. 1937), 202-203.

N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
